yuxingzhengyuanhuibiaoshi,jin()nianyuexingzhengyuanhuitongguo[xingrenyouxianjiaotonganquanxingdonggangling],yuelifayuanxiuzheng[daolujiaotongguanlichufatiaoli]bufentiaowenshengxiaoshixing,erxinfashishiyijiangjinbannian,gedijiaotongzhixuyuxingrenanquandebaozhangdouyouxianzhugaishan.yuanzhangqiangdiao,zhengfuquebaodaolujiaotonganquandemubiaoyufangxiangbubian,danxiangguancelveyaoyushijujin,qingjiaotongbuhuitongneizhengbujiugezhongweiguitaiyangxiangjiaqufenchubutongweixianchengdu,bingcongyouxiaofengxiankongguanjiaodu,tongpanjiantaoxiangguanjidianguidingdehelixing,jinlizaihangrenanquan'xingcheanquanyurenmingongzuoquanyizhongqudegenghaodepingheng.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,haijidejinnianshangbannianxuduorenshuotaiwanshi[xingrendiyu];weibaozhangguorenjiaotonganquan,huiying[hailuyumin]deshehuiqidai,jinnianyuexingzhengyuanhuitongguo[xingrenyouxianjiaotonganquanxingdonggangling],lifayuanyebufenchaoye'jiasuxiufa,zaiyuexiuzheng[daolujiaotongguanlichufatiaoli]bufentiaowenshengxiaoshixing,rangxinfayuxinzhengtongbutuidong.yuanzhangganxiebucixinlaodediyixianzhifatongren,yijidifangzhengfuyuzhongyangxiangguanbuhuimiqiehezuo,haiyouquantiguorenpeihezhichi,xianzaigedijiaotongzhixuyuxingrenanquandebaozhangdouyouxianzhugaishan,youqishijiaotongshigusiwangrenshuxiangjiaoqu()niantongqizhuyuexiajiang,queshiyichengxiandaoangaishanchengxiao.chenyuanzhangzhichu,suiranzhengtidaoanzhengceyichujianchengxiao,danzaiguoqubanniandezhifaguochengzhong,yinbufenpeitaocuoshishangweizhenwanbei,jiashangxinfagangshanglu,daozhidiyixianzhifarenyuanfudanchenzhong,zhixingjieguoyeluxufaxianyouyingxiangminzhongxingcheyugongzuoquanyishihengdexianxiang,shenzhizaochengxuduominzhongdanyougongzuoquanzaoboduodebuanyukunrao,yinciyoubiyaojishidiaozhenggengzhouquanheyidezuofalaihuiyingzhexieminzhongdexinsheng.zheduanqijian,jingyoujiaotongbujineizhengbuluxucaiquduoxiangweidiaocuoshi,queshirangjidiananjianshuhelixiajiangchengduo.chenyuanzhangjinyibubiaoshi,xinfashishiyijiangjinbannian,zhengfuquebaodaolujiaotonganquandemubiaoyufangxi yuxingzhengyuanhuitingquneizhengbu[tuidongshehuizhuzhaichengguoyutishengshezhaiyongdigonggeijingjincuoshi]baogaohoubiaoshi,zhengfuziniantuidongshezhaizhengce,zaigebuhuiyudifangzhengfugongtongnulixia,jiangyuniandishunlidachengwanhushezhaimubiao;xiajieduanjiangyiniandawanhushezhaiweimubiao,bingyishenghuoquanfangshitongchouguihua.yuanzhangqiangdiao,weilaigexianshijinxingzhengtikaifaqubanliquduanzhengshoujishidizhonghuashi,bixubaoliugongshezhaishiyong,bingiezhuananrangshougeizhongyangzhengfuxingbanshezhai;ciwai,dushigengxinjidazhongyunshudaoxiangkaifa()de[rongjijiangli]ji[zengerongji]xiangmu,yexuyouxiannarutigongshezhai,yituozhanshezhaiyongdideduoyuanqudeguandao.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,weidachengcaiyingwenzongtongnianwanhushezhaizhengcemubiao,neizhengbubuduanjingjinxiangguanzuowei,nianqigengqidong[zhongyangzhudao,difangpeihe]moshi,jiasushezhaidechengzhangliang,zaigebuhuijidifangzhengfugongtongnulixia,nianduwanchenghuandaozhijiexingjianshezhai,nianjiangbianjiquanguo,yuqikeshunliyuniandidachengwanhushezhaimubiao,xiangguanzhengcetuidongchengguozhidekending.chenyuanzhangzhichu,xiajieduanshezhaiyiniandawanhuweimubiao,jiangyishenghuoquanfangshisheding,qingneizhengbujijituidongbanli,bingqinggebuhuichixupandianqiejijitigongtudigongneizhengbuxingbanshezhai;lingqingneizhengbujijipandianxiangguanfaling,yuzhengtikaifadiqunaru[shehuifulisheshiyongdi]huo[shezhaizhuanyongqu].weituozhanshezhaiyongdideduoyuanqudeguandao,weilaigexianshijinxingzhengtikaifaqubanliquduanzhengshoujishidizhonghuashi,bixubaoliugongshezhaishiyong,bingqiezhuananrangshougeizhongyangzhengfuxingbanshezhai.ciwai,dushigengxinjidazhongyunshudaoxiangkaifa()de[rongjijiangli]ji[zengerongji]xiangmu,yexuyouxiannarutigongshezhai,shichengshikaifazhiji,jiunengyuxiannarujuzhuguihua,yiyinyingweilaizhoubianzhengtifazhanjijuzhuxuqiu,ruqidachengxiajieduanshezhaizhengcemubiao.

xingzhengyuanhuijin()ritongguoxingzhengyuanzhujizongchubianjude[zhongyangzhengfuyanzhongteshuchuanranxingfeiyanfangzhijishukunzhenxingtebiejuesuan],jianghansongjianchayuan.xingzhengyuanzhangchenjianrenbiaoshi,gejiguanyiwanchenggexiangfangyijishukunzhenxinggongzuo,bingbingchizunjieyuanzezhixinggexiangjihua,suichujuesuanjieyuyiyuan,weilairengqinggejiguanjixutuidonggexiangyihouqianghuataiwanzhengtijingjiyushehuirenxingzhigongzuo,bingchixunulishouhuguorenjiankang.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,weifangduruqinyuchuanbo,bingyinyingqiduiguoneijingjishehuizhichongji,xingzhengyuanyiju《yanzhongteshuchuanranxingfeiyanfangzhijishukunzhenxingtebietiaoli》guiding,yunianbianlietebieyusuan;suihouguojiyiqingchixukuoda'guoneiyiqingshengwen,lingyujinianjianzhuijiaciyusuan,suichuhejibianlieyiyuan.chenyuanzhangjinyibuzhichu,zhenianduolaizaiquantiguorengongtishijian'zhongyangyudifangzhengfugongtongnulihezuoxia,zouguoyiqingnanguan.gejiguanyiwanchenggexiangfangyijishukunzhenxinggongzuo,bingbingchizunjieyuanzezhixinggexiangjihua,suichujuesuanjieyuyiyuan.weilairengqinggejiguanjixutuidonggexiangyihouqianghuataiwanzhengtijingjiyushehuirenxingzhigongzuo,bingchixunulishouhuguorenjiankang.xingzhengyuanzhujizongchubiaoshi,gaitebieyusuanzhixingqijianweinianyuerizhinianyueri,bianliesuichuyusuanshuyiyuan,yijujiezhaiwuyiyuanjiyiyongyiqianniandusuijishengyuyiyuanyinying.zhixingjieguo,suirujuesuanshuyiyuan,jiaoyusuanshuzengjiayiyuan,zhuyaoxiweishengfulibuyifaduiminzhongruzhujizhongjianyisuozhengshouzhifeiyongjijiaohuifangyiwuzidaishoukuandengshouru;suichujuesuanshuyiyuan,jiaoyusuanshuyiyuanjieyuyiyuan,zhuyaoxinongyebu'weishengfulibujilaodongbubanliyanzhongteshuchuanranxingfeiyanshukunzhenxingdengjihuajingfeijieyusuozhi;suiru'suichuxiangdi,chaduanyiyuan,yijujiezhaiwuyiyuanjiyiyongyiqianniandusuijishengyuyiyuanmiping.

zaihangzhengyuanhuitingquguojiafazhanweiyuanhui[qianzhanjichujianshejihuashizhengliangdianzixunwang]baogaohoubiaoshi,gaiwangzhan()yiminzhongjiaoduweichufadian,guinachudaminzhongyougan'chengxiaoxianzhudeqianzhanjianshejihua,keyixianshibiehuobadajianshebieliaojiezhengfuyifenbiewanchengdejihuaneirongjizhongyaochengguo,huanyingminzhongduojialiyong.yuanzhangyezhishixiangguanbuhuizhudongxuandaozhuzhengjihuadetuidongchengxiaoyuliangdian,bingyangeguankongqianzhanjichujianshejihuadisiqitebieyusuandezhixingjindu,zhipantouguozhongyangyudifangzhengfugongtongnuli,jiasudachenggexiangjihuademubiaojixiaoyi.chenyuanzhangzhichu,zhengfuziminguonianqitouguoqianzhanjichujianshetebieyusuan,zaizhongyanggebuhuiyudifangzhengfululihezuoxia,yiwanchengxuduoqianzhanxingjianshe,weiyinzixunluocha,xuduominzhongduixiangguanjianshechengguobingbuqingchu,yibuzhisuoshujiaxiangyiyouneixiegonggongjianshe,yincizhengfuyoubiyaojiangxiangguanxunxixiangguorengongkaijielu.tayaoganxiexiangguanbuhuipeiheguofahuijianzhiwancheng[qianzhanjihuashizhengliangdianzixunwang],bianliminzhongliaojiezhengfuzhexienianlaituidongqianzhanjihuadezhongyaochengguo.chenyuanzhangqiangdiao,[qianzhanjihuashizhengliangdianzixunwang]shiyiminzhongjiaoduweichufadian,touguosandawangyeshejilinian,tigongjianshedidian'jihuaqicheng'shuoming'xiaoyi'jingfeidengneirong.chuguinachudaminzhongyougan'chengxiaoxianzhudeqianzhanjianshejihua,minzhongyekeyixianshibiechaxungexiangzhenshiqudeqianzhanjihuajianshe,huozhijiecongbadajianshebieliaojiezhengfuyifenbiewanchengdejihuaneirong,huanyingminzhongduojialiyong,yeqingxiangguanbuhuizhudongduiminzhongxuandaozhuzhengjihuadetuidongchengxiaoyuliangdian.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,qianzhanjichujianshejihuatuidongqijin,chengguofengshuo,zhengtixiaoyihangaijingji'shehuijihuanjingdengmianxiang,duiyucujinquyujunheng'tishengminzhongshenghuopinzhi,zhujianchongshiwoguochanyeweilaisuoxugexiangjichujianshedengfangmian,junyoushizhibangzhu.muqianqianzhanjichujianshejihuadisiqitebieyusuanshangzaizhixingzhong,qingxiangguanbuhuichixu zaihangzhengyuanhuitingquxingzhengyuangonggonggongchengweiyuanhui[zhengfuzixunfuwucaigougexin－zianruguijicaigouzhiyin]baogaohoubiaoshi,zianjiguoan,gejiguanjiexutigaojingjuebingtourubiyaoziyuan,zuohaofanghuzhunbei.benciyouxingzhengyuangongchenghuijishuweifazhanbugongtonghezuo,jiangzianguidingnaruzhengfudezixuncaigou,xiezhugejiguanqianghuajiluoshizianzuowei,yikecujinguoneixiangguanchanyetishengguojijingzhengli,qingyouguanbuhuichixusoujichanyejijiguanhuikuiyijian,shishigundongdiaoxiuxiangguanneirong;lingqingxingzhengyuanzhujizongchuyushuweibuzhenduiyunduanhuaqushiyanyixiangguanyusuankemujibianliefangshidiaozhengcuoshi.chenyuanzhangzhichu,zianjiguoan,geguoduiyuzianyitidezhongshijitourujingfeizhuniantisheng,ertaiwanweiquanqiuzaoshouziangongjiderequzhiyi,gengxianshiqianghuazianfanghudejipoxing,yincigejiguandoubixutigaojingjuebingtourubiyaodeziyuan,shikezuohaoxiangguandefanghuzhunbei.yuanzhangqiangdiao,weileqianghuazhengfuzianfanghujicujinchanyejinbu,kuabuhuixuchixuhezuo,benciyouxingzhengyuangongchenghuijishuweibugongtonghezuo,jiangzianguidingnaruzhengfudezixuncaigou,xiezhugejiguanqianghuajiluoshizianzuowei,yikecujinguoneixiangguanchanyetishengguojijingzhengli,duiyubuhuijianhezuojiejuewenti,tayaobiaodakendingjiganxie,bingqingdajiaphixunuli.chenyuanzhangqinggebuhuijigedifangzhengfuluoshizhixingbencizixunfuwucaigougexinxiangguanshixiang<ctrrl>,bingqingshuweibu'xingzhengyuangongchenghuichixusoujichanyejijiguanhuikuiyijian,shishigundongdiaoxiuxiangguanneirong,yichaoxiangzhengfuzianwanzhengfanghu,chanyetishengjinjunguojideyuanjingmaijin.lingjianyuruantijiziliaokudeyunduanhuashimuqianzixunfuwudefazhanzhuliu,xiangguanyusuandekemujibianliefangshiyiyingnengyinyingyunduanhuadequshidiaozheng,lirubianlieweizibenmendengzuofa,yuanzhangyeqingxingzhengyuanzhujizongchuyushuweibugongtongyanyi.

xingzhengyuanyuanzhangchenjianrenzuo()riyaojizhengwencanfuyuanzhang'limengyanmishuzhang'linwanyizhengwuweiyuan'luobingchengzhengwuweiyuan'wuzechengzhengwuweiyuan'linzilunfayanren'neizhengbulinyouchangbuzhang'jingjibuwangmeihuabuzhang'huanjingbuxuefushengbuzhang'weifubuxueruiyuanbuzhang'laodongbuchenmingrencizhangjibenyuanrenshixingzhengzongchusujunrongrenshizhangdengshouzhangtingqu[pingdongxianhuozaijiuzaiyingbianjiantaobaogaohouxujingjincuoshizhuananbaogao]huiyi,huizhongchenyuanzhangguanqieneizhengbuhuozaishigudiaochajindujihouxuguihua,bingqinghuanjingbu'jingjibu'neizhengbujilaodongbudengxiangguanbuhuiduigongchangyiranwuguanlijizhijinxingjiantao,huizhongpandianxiaofangzhengcejiweilaijingjincuoshi,lingduiyuxiaofangrenyuanquanyicuoshijinxingkuabuhuitaolun,bingzhuizongshangwangzhefuxu'peichangzhuangkuang,gengzechengxiangguanbuhuijinsujiantaojingjinweixianwupinguanlijizhi.neizhengbuzhichu,gaibuyiyuyueriqidongzaihaishigudiaochahui,bingguihuadingyuyuerizhaojidiaochaweiyuanzhaokaipingdonghuozaishigudiaochahuidiyicihuiyi,gaibubingbiaoshimuqianpingdongxianzhengfuyizhenduimingyanggongsi[weiyudiyishijiantigongwanzhengjiuzaizixun'weizhidingzhuanrenxiezhujiuzaizhiqueshijiguoyanghuawucunfangchaoguobei]dengsanxiangzhongdaweifashixiangjinxingkaifa,houxujiangduikaifashixiangzhengtijindujinxingzhangwozhuizong.chenyuanzhangtingqulinwanyizhengweiqinfuxianchang,zhenduipingdonghuozaishoushangrenyuanjishanghuanjiashujiaohuanyijianhou,zhishiweishengfulibu'jingjibu'neizhengbu'jilaodongbudengquanzebuhui,jijixiezhushangzhejilinanzhefuxupeichang'baoxianjinqingling'yiliaoyushuhouchongjian'xinlizishangdengshixiang,bingqinglinwanyizhengweichixuxiezhuxiediao.chenyuanzhangbingzhichuxiandaishehuiyingyonghuaxuewuzhipinxiangfanduo,yaoyingyongxianjinkejizuofajinxingguanli,yaoqiugebuhuichongxinjianshijuyibaotexingdeguoyanghuawuguanlifangshi,bingqianghuagongchangyiran'yibaohuaxuewuzhiguanlixiangguanjizhi,muqianhuanjingbuyijianzhihuaxueyunyijiduxinghuaxuewuzhixukeguanlixitong'laodongbuzhiyeanquanweisheng jiejian[taijiakejihezuozhounianqingzhuhuodongdaibiaotuan]yixingshibiaoshi,guojiheczuoshituidongkeyanfazhanbukehuoquedeyihuan,taijiakejihezuoyimairudinian,zheduanchaoguosifenzhiyishijideyouyi,weishuangbianzaijiaoyu'kejijichanyechuangxinyujishuyanfa,diandingshenhoudehezuohuobanguanxi,weilaitaijiashuangfangzaiyanjiujirencaihezuoshangjianggengweijinmi,bingqiezaijishuchuangxinshengtaitixizhonggongmouhezuo,chuangzaoshuangyingqiji,rangshijiebiandegengmeihao.chenyuanzhangzhicishizhichu,jianadaguojiayanjiuyuanlvlingjiaguochanguanxueyanjiegongtongzuchengdefangtuanfangtai,bingqiejiangyuguojiakexuejijishuweiyuanhuijiudizhenkeji'rengongzhihuijixinyingshengwuzhijijubanyantaohui,yujicanyurenshujiangdaren,zheshiyiqinghoushuangbianshoucidaxingyantaohui,tayaoganxiefangtuanbuyuanqianlilaidaotaiwan,zhichitaijiashuangbiankeyanhezuo.chenyuanzhangzhichu,taijiakejihezuoyimairudinian,zheduanchaoguosifenzhiyishijideyouyi,weishuangbianzaijiaoyu'kejijichanyechuangxinyujishuyanfa,diandingshenhoudehezuohuobanguanxi.guowangtaijiakejiyanjiuhezuozhuyaojizhongzaishengwuyixueyunaimijishulingyu,fangtuanchengyuanbencifangtaixingchengyejiangyuguokehuiyiwaidezhongyaokeyanjigoushouzhangjinxingjiaoliu;lingwai,woguojiangfenbieyujianadaxianjinyanjiusuo()jirencaipeiyupingtaiqianshuxindehezuobeiwanglu,weilaitaijiashuangfangzaiyanjiujirencaihezuoshangkewanggengweijinmi,xiangxinfangtuanchengyuanyenengjianzhengshuangbianzaiqitakeyanlingyudehezuoqianli.chenyuanzhangqiangdiao,guojihezuoshituidongkeyanfazhanbukehuoquedeyihuan,tayaoganxiejianadaguojiayanjiuyuanzhangqitouruyutaiwanxueyanjiehezuo,chixuzuoweitaijiakeyanhezuodejichuqiaoliang,meiheshuangbianzhongyaokeyanjigouhezuo,duitaijiakejihezuoyanjiuyurencaipeiyugeiyuwendingdezhichi,yeqidaiweilaichixutishengtaijiashuangbianguanxi,bingqiezaijishuchuangxinshengtaitixizhonggongmouhezuo,chuangzaoshuangyingqiji,rangshijiebiandegengmeihao.fangbinyixingyouguokehuiwuzhengzhongzhuweijijianadazhutaibeimaoyibanshichunijiemin()daibiaopeitong,qianlaixingzhengyuanbaihuichenyuanzha jiejianjianadadiqutaiwanshanghuifangwentuanshibiaoshi,taiwanyujianadagongxiangziyou'minzhu'fazhijirenquanbaozhangdenglinianjiazhi,zaijingjilingyuyejuyougaoduhubuxing.weizhichitaiwanjiaru(kuataipingyanghuobanquanmianjinbuxieding),jianadataishangcengyunianjubangongkaishengminghui,jin()niangengjuban[]huodong,duiyuzhengquzhuliuminyizhichiwoguojiaruyouxiangdangzhengmiandebangzhu.yuanzhangqiangdiao,taiwanyizuohaozhunbei,xiwangjiezhongqiaojiedeyingxiangli,xiezhutuidongtaiwanjiaru,rangshijiegengrenshitaiwan.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,fangtuanchengyuanzaigezigongzuogangweishangdouyoufeichangjiechudebiaoxian,cicizhuanchenghuiguofangwenjiaoliu,weizhengfuzhongyaozhengcegongxianxinli,tayaozhishangzuichengzhidejingyiyuxieyi.yuanzhangzhichu,taiwanyujianadashilinianxiangjindeguojia,gongxiangziyou'minzhu'fazhijirenquanbaozhangdenglinianjiazhi,jianadazaixinde[yintaizhanlve]zhongzhanxianduitaihaihepingwendingdezhongshi,gengbiaoshihuichixuqianghuahetaiwandehuobanguanxi,erwendinghepingdetaihaijiushishijiegeguofanrongfuzhizhisuoxi.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,taiwanyujianadazaijingjilingyufangmianjuyougaoduhubuxing,niantaijiashuangbianmaoyizongeyueweiyimeiyuan,yijujianadaquanqiushiwubutongji,taiwanshijianadanianchukouchengzhangzuikuaidegemubiaoshichangzhiyi;jinnianyuetaijiayijiu[touzicujinjibaozhangxieyi]()jinxingdiyilundezhengshitanpan,duiwoguozaiguojijingmaolingyudediweijixingxiangyouxiangdangzhengmiandeyingxiang,tayaotebieganxiedengzhenzhongzhengwuweiyuandailingtongrenyujianadatanpan,jinchengxiangdangchenggong,caiyingwenzongtongdezhihouyexiangdangxinwei.chenyuanzhangzhichu,jianadashifeichangzhongyaodechengyuanguo,yeshiming()nianlunzhiguozhuxi,erjianadataishangweizhichitaiwanjiaru,cengyunianjubangongkaishengminghui,huyujianadalianbangzhengfuzhichitaiwanjiarushenqingan,xiezhutaiwanjinzaowanchengruhui.ciwai,jinnianjianadadiqutaiwanshanghuiyeyuduolunduolianhejuban[(zhichitaiwanjiarukuataipingyanghuobanquanmianjinbuxieding)]huodong,bingdijiaogongtongshengminggeiyuhuidejianadazhongyiyuanguojimaoyiweiyuan xingzhengyuanfuyuanzhangzhengwencanjin()richuxi[neizhengbuguojiagongyuanshujiguanshouzhangbudajixuanshijijiepaidianli]shibiaoshi,jinrizugaideguojiagongyuanshuguanxiazuoguojiagongyuan'zuoshosuhanguojiazirangongyuan'chushidijihaiandiqudeng,zerenfanweixiangdangguangfan.ertaiwantudiduoshuqianshanjigaoshandixing,tuxianguojiagongyuandezhongyaoxing,zhipandajiashanyongguojiagongyuanzhongyaodeziranjirenwenzichan,rangquanshijienenggojinyiburenshitaiwan.zhengfuyuanzhangzhicishishouxiangongxineizhengbuwanchengzuzhigaizaodezhongyaorenwu,jiangyingjianshugaizhi,bingyujinrizhengshijiepaichengli[guotuguanlishu]yu[guojiagongyuanshu].fuyuanzhangbiaoshi,guojiagongyuanshuguanxiazuoguojiagongyuanjizuoshoushanguojiazirangongyuan,zhanquantaitudimianji,zaijiashangguanliquanguochushidijihaiandiqu,zerenfanweixiangdangguangfan,qingxingzhengyuanrenshixingzhengzongchuduojiazhichigaishurenli,jiaqiangtuidongguotubaoyu.zhengfuyuanzhangjinyibushuo,taiwanfudimianjidawanqianpingfanggongli,qizhongsanfenzhierdetudiweiqianshanjigaoshandixing,yongyoufengfuduoyangdeziranshengtai,ermeiyizuoguojiagongyuandouyouqihexin'dutedejiazhi,chuleweihushengwuduoyangxing'qidibaohu'ziranbaoyudenggongnengwai,yetigongtianyediaochayanjiu'huanjingjiaoyu'guanguangxiuxian'shengtaitiyanjihuwaidengshanhuodongdeng,xiwangdajianenggoushanyongguojiagongyuanzhongyaodeziranjirenwenzichan,rangquanshijiejinyiburenshitaiwan.zhicijieshuhou,zhengfuyuanzhangyuxingzhengyuanzhangjingsenzhengwuweiyuan'neizhengbulinyouchangbuzhang'huajingquncizhang'guojiagongyuanshuchenmaochunshuzhang'xingzhengyuanrenshixingzhengzongchusujunrongrenshizhang'xingzhengyuanjiaotonghuanjingziyuanchuchenyingrongchuzhang'neizhengbujingzhengshubaoanjingchadiqizongduiwengqunnengzongduizhang'tanghuizhenliweidengguibinshouchijiepaihongsheng,yitongjiexiahongbu,wanchengjiepaiyishi;suihou,fuyuanzhangyeyulirenyingjiansuhshuzhangdengguibinheyingliunian.
xingzhengyuanfuyuanzhangzhengwencanjin()richuxi[gongsheng．chaoyuexiangxiang]zhihuiyiliaogaofengluntanshibiaoshi,xingzhengyuanfeichangzhongshijizhichizhihuiyiliaodefazhan,bujinxiuzhengtongguo《shengjiyiyaochanyefazhantiaoli》、tuidongliangqi[taiwanxingdongjihua],shang()yueriyitongguo[xingzhengyuanjisuoshujiguan(gou)shiyongshengchengshicankaozhiyin(caoan)].qipantouguojinriluntan,rangtaiwanzhihuiyiliaojiyingyonghuodegengduoqifa.zhengfuyuanzhangzhichu,xingzhengyuanfeichangzhongshijizhichizhihuiyiliaodefazhan,nian《shengjixinyaochanyefazhantiaoli》xiuzhengwei《shengjiyiyaochanyefazhantiaoli》hou,jinarushuweiyiliao'zaishengyiliao'jingzhunyiliaodenglingyu;lingwai,zairengongzhihui()kejidetuidongshang,zhengfuyetuidongliangqi[taiwanxingdongjihua],muqiantichudedierqijihuazijin()nianqizhinianzhi,weijinian,pannengcujinguangfanyunyong,bingpeiyangrencaijieguiguoji.zhengfuyuanzhangbiaoshi,kejizaiyiliaolingyudeyingyongfeichangguangfan,baokuolinchuangziliaozhuanyi'yixueyingxiangjiedu'xinyaokaifadeng;lingwai,shengchengshideyingyongyeduiyiyuanguanlijitishengjiuyitiyantigonghenhaodexiezhu.fuyuanzhangqipanjinrisuoyouyuhuideyiliaolingyuzhuanjiaxuezhe,nenggoutouguoluntanfenxiangbaoguiyijian,rangtaiwanzhihuiyiliaojiyingyonghuodegengduoqifa.zhengfuyuanzhangjinyibuzhichu,minzhongduikejidefazhanyouzhuduoqidai,weidaoruyiliaoguochengzhong,kongshejiyixuelunlijizhuanyepanduanwenti,lingshengchengshiyishejiguojiaanquan'zixunanquan'lunlidaodedengfengxian,youqizhengfubumenzhixinggongwushi,juyouyidingjiminxingjizhuanyexing,yincizaishengchengshideshiyongshangbixuyousuoguifan.youjianyuci,xingzhengyuanyujinnianyueritongguo[xingzhengyuanjisuoshujiguan(gou)shiyongshengchengshicankaozhiyin(caoan)],chupannengcujinshengchengshiyingyonggengduoyuanhuawai,yerangxiangguanyingyongjiyanfachanpinbeishouxinlai.zhicijieshuhou,zhengfuyuanzhangyuzhubandanweiyuanjiantianxiawenhuashiyequnchuangbanrengaoxijun'shezhangwanglixing'taiwanchuangbanrenduyijin'guangdafuzongjinglizhangjiayuan'mokezongjingliyuwenhui'huashuozongjingliwuhanz chuxi[shengkelisiduofujiniweisizhouniandulijinianri]qingzhujiuhuishibiaoshi,taiwanshikeguoyuniandulijianguohoudiyigejianjiaodeguojia,jin()niantongshiyeshiliangguojianjiaozhounian.guoqunianlai,taikegongtongtuidongduoxiangjishuhezuojihua,qiekeguoyibufendangpaijiandingzhichitaiwancanyuguojizuzhi,shiwoguozuijianshideyoubangzhiyi.zhanwangweilai,taiwanjiangyukeguochixuzaiguojichangyuxianghufuchi,zhuiqiuliangguofanrongfazhan,gongtongweishijiezuochugengduogongxian,yexiwangkeguozaiguojishehuichixuweiwoguofacsheng,zuobiciqiangeryoulidehoudun.chenyuanzhangdaochanghou,xianlingtingkeguogeshouyanchanggequ,jigangguyanzoushengkelisiduofujiniweisiguogeyuzhonghuaminguoguoge.suihou,yuanzhangzhicishizhichu,tahenrongxingshouyaobingdaibiaocaiyingwenzongtongcanjiakeguozhouniandulijinianriqingzhujiuhui,jinniantongshiyeshitaikeliangguojianjiaozhounian,waijiaobuzhangwuzhaoxiezhengyizongtongteshishenfenlvtuanqianwangkeguozhuhe,guofangbuyepaiqiansanjunyiduifukeguobiaoyan,huanqingliangguonianyouyi.yuanzhangshuo,taiwanshikeguoyuniandulijianguohoudiyigejianjiaodeguojia,taikeshizhenqiejiaoxindehaopengyou,jinriqingzhuhuodongduiliangguoyiyifeifan,tayaodaibiaotaiwanzhengfujirenmin,xiangkeguozhengfujirenminbiaodazuichengzhizhuhe.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,taiwanyukeguodiliweizhisuixiangjuyaoyuan,danrengyouxuduogongtongdian,liruliangguojieweimeilidehaidaoguojia,renminyoushanhaoke,bingzhuiqiuminzhu'ziyoujirenquandengpushijiazhi.nianlai,liangguogongtongtuidongduoxiangjishuhezuojihua,fanweihangaiguangfanduoyuan,congjiaoyu'zaishengnengyuan'qihoubianqiannongyediaoshi'jichujianshe,daoyiliaogongwei'zitongxun'feiqiwuhuishoudeng,chengguoxiangdangfengshuo,huodeliangguozhengfuyurenmingaodukending.chenyuanzhangjinyibushuo,liangguogaocengyehudongmiqie,qu()nianyuekeguodelu()zonglishangrenhougeyuejilvtuanlaifang,jiutaikehezuoguanxiyucaizongtongshenrujiaohuanyijian;jinnianyuekeguofuzonglihanli()yelvtuanfangtai,keguogaocengyizaiyixingdongzhanxianshuangfangjianshidehuobanguanxi.chenyuanzhangqiangdiao,keguoshiwoguozuijianshide chuxinian《tianxiazazhi》「tianxiayongxugongminjiang]banjiangdianlishi,biaozhanghuojiangqiyeduituidonghuanjingyongxudegongxian,bingqixutamenchixuyinlingtaiwanshehuimaixiangqingming'jinbu'guanhuai'yongxujiazhifazhan,rangquanshijiekanjiantaiwanmaixiang[jinglingpaifang]deqituxin.yuanzhangqiangdiao,zhongyangyudifang'zhengfuyuminjianyingtouguogongsixieli,shitaiwanzoudegengwenjian,jinerchengweiyazhoudiquhuanjingbaohu'qihoubianqianyinyingjitanfeiguanlidengfangmiandexuexikaimo,yidazaogengjianren'yongxudetaiwan.chenyuanzhangzhichu,[tianxiayongxugongminjiang]jingzhengxiangdangjilie,huojiangqiyezai[gongsizhili]'[qiyechengnuo]'[shehuicanyu]'[huanjingyongxu]dengsidapingxuangoumianbiaoxianyouyi,congduojiaqiyezhongtuoyingerchu,pingxuanweitaiwanzuijiayongxuqiye,xiangdangburongyi,tayaozhishangchengzhigonghezhiyi.chenyuanzhangganxie《tianxiazazhi》lianxunianjuban[tianxiayongxugongminjiang],guliqiyezhangqitouruqiyeshehuizeren,weitaiwanshehuiyongxugonghao'dianfangongchuangjiningjugongshizhuruzhongyaoliliang;tayeqixuhuojiangqiyezaijiezaili,chixuyinlingtaiwanshehuimaixiangqingming'jinbu'guanhuai'yongxujiazhifazhan,chengweitaiwansuoyouqiyedexuexidianfan,bujinrangtaiwanzouxiangshijiewutai,yerangquanshijiekanjiantaiwantuidongjinglingpaifangdeqituxin.chenyuanzhangtidao,guanlicelvedashimaike．bote()cengtichangyong[chuangzaogongxiangjiazhi]()dazaoquanqiuqiyexiayibojingzhengli,mingquemiaoshu[qiyeshehuizeren()]dejingyi,zhuzhangquanqiuqiyelingdaorendangwuzhiji,jiushisikaojiangqiyeshehuizerenhuodongyuqiyejingzhengyoushijiehe,bingchuangzaochuqiyegongtongzhuiqiu[yongxujingying]dejingzhengli.chenyuanzhangjinyibushuoming,xiangtonggainianyekeyunyongzaiguojiazhilishang,xingzhengyuanweiguancheyongxufazhansiwei,zhanxianzhuanxingjuexin,yijiang[jinglingpaifang]mubiaonaru《qihoubianqianyinyingfa》，gebuhuijiexujuyiluxutuixingzhengshoutanfei'chenglitanquanjiaoyisuodengpeitaofangan,bingtouguo[xiangguanjianzhanlve]chixutuidongjizhuizongguankao,shiquanguochanyejiquantiguomingongtongmaixiangjinglingmubiao.chenyuanzhangbia xingzhengyuanfuyuanzhangzhengwencanjin()richuxitaibei[jiankangjianzhubaijinjirenzheng]shoupaidianli,binggonghetaibeidalouronghuolvjianzhuguojibiaozhunjijiankangjianzhushuangbaijinrenzheng,gengchuangxiabaijinjirenzhengzuigaofenjilu,daibiaoqiyetuidongjianzhuyichengweiweilaidezhuliu,yeqipanminjiannenggoujixujiaqiangshangyesheshijijianzhudejiantangongzuo,chixuluoshijienengjiantan'dazaoxunhuanjingji.zhengfuyuanzhangzhichu,tayuniandanrenxingzhengyuanxinwenjuzhangshi,cengjuban[xunzhaotaiwanyixiang]quanminpiaoxuanhuodong,dangshibaokuotaibeiyuanshanfandian'taibeichezhan'guoligugongbowuyuan'taibeidaloudengzhimingjianwu,yijiminjianxinyangmazu'chuantongwenhuapilibudaixidengjunminglieqizhong,zuizhongpiaoxuanjieguochulu,youtaibeidalouronghuodiming,xianjianzaiguorenxinzhong,taibeidalounengchongfendaibiaotaiwanyixiang.zhengfuyuanzhangbiaoshi,taibeidalouxingjianzhichu,cengjinglitaiwanzhengtijingjismuaituishiqi,gaijianzhunengzairucijiankundetiaojianxiawangong,shishubuyi,erluochengqiyonghougengcengchengweiquanshijiezuigaodejianzhuwu;rujintaibeidaloubujinshiqiyejinzhubangongdeshouxuan,yeshilaitaiguanguangkexiaizaofangdedifang.zhengfuyuanzhangtebiegongxitaibeidalouronghuolvjianzhuguojibiaozhunjijiankangjianzhushuangbaijinrenzheng;qizhong,zaijiankangjianzhuxiangpingguzhibiaozhong,zai[kongqi]'[shui]'[chuangxingainian]leibiejiehuodemanfen,chuangxiabaijinjirenzhengzuigaofenjilu,daibiaoqiyetuidongjianzhuyichengweiweilaidezhuliu,erjiantan'huihuxi,qieyuhuanjingxiangrongdezhuzhai,gengshiweilaijianzhudequshi.zhengfuyuanzhangqiangdiao,weidadaotaiwannianjinglingpaifyngdecelvemubiao,zhengfuyitouruxuduonuli,xiwangminjiannenggoujixujiaqiangshangyesheshijijianzhudejiantangongzuo,chixuluoshijienengjiantan'dazaoxunhuanjingji,bingzhufumeiyigeqiyezaishangyeyingyunshangjienenghuodegengdadechenggongi.cixing,zhengfuyuanzhangdaochanghou,xianguanshang[taibeiyongxulvcheng]yingpian,bingjianzhengguojijianzhuyanjiuyuan()yazhouquzongcaixueyabanfa[jiankangjianzhubaijinjirenzheng]yutaibeidongshizhangzhangxueshun.suih zaihangzhengyuanhuitingquguojiakexuejijishuweiyuanhui[zaihaifangjiurenxingkejifangan(nian)]baogaohoubiaoshi,benfanganxiwangtouguokejiyingyong,qianghuazhongyangyudifangfangjiuzainengli,qingcanyubenfangandegebuhuiwubiyizhaofanganneirongchoubianjingfei,jijiluoshizhixing,bingqingguokehuizhangwojindu,dachengtuidongzaihaifangjiushuweizhuanxing'jingjinzaihaifangjiufengxianpingguyudiaoshicelve,yijizhihuizhilinaizaiyongxushenghuoquandezhengcemubiao,bingrangchengguoluoshiyingyongyudifangzhengfu,qianghuachengxiangrenxing,quebaotaiwanminzhongyongyouanjuleyedeshenghuo.chenyuanzhangzhichu,jinnianzaiqihoubianqianyingxiangxia,taiwandejiangyuxingtairiqujiduanhua,taifengheshuihanzaisuodailaidechongjiriyimingian,bujinjin()nianshangbanniantaiwanmianlinshuiqingchijinjigaowenqianhandeweixie;xiabanniangengyindusurui'kanu'sulajihaikuitaifenglianxulaixi,zaochenggexiangzaihai,xiangguanzaihoufuyuanchongjiangongzuoqijinrengzaijinxingzhong.chenyuanzhangqiangdiao,xingzhengyuanyujinnianyuerihedingguokehui[zaihaifangjiurenxingkejifangan(nian)],jipantouguokexuejishudeliangneng,qianghuazhongyangyudifangfangjiuzainengli.youqijinqijicitaifenglaixi,tajieqinzishidaozhongyangzaihaiyingbianzhongxin,liaojiegebuhuijunnengchongfenyingyongkejijinxingyingbianzhengbei,baokuoduizaiqingdejiance'guanceyuduan'zhong'zhangqideyucedeng,duizaihaiqingzizhangwoyuyingbiannengliyoujidazhuyi.chenyuanzhangqingweilaicanyubenfangandegebuhui,wubiyizhaofanganneirongchoubianjingfei,jijiluoshizhixing,youqiyingshanyongrengongzhihui()'zhihuiyansuandenggaokeji;ciwai,difangzhengfuyiyingnarugongtongfangzaiquan,yuzhongyangzaihaiyingbianzhongxingongtonghezuo.yuanzhangqiangdiao,weiyouzhongyang'difang'minjianqixinhezuo,cainengrangfangzaigongzuozuodegenghao,jianqingzaihaiduinongye'qiyehuogezhongchanyedechongji,gengzhongyaodeshi,meigejiatingjigerenyingchediluoshifangzaizhunbeigongzuo,yijinyibutishengtaiwanfangzairenxing.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,fangzaiguojiaxingjihuazituidongyilai,yilubuduanjingjin,chengguoyexiangdangfengshuo.weiyinyingriquduoyu [xingzhengyuanyinyingxinbeishiyoueryuanyisibudangweiyaoanzhuananxiaozu]jin()rishangwuzhaokaidisancihuiyi,taolunbabituodengfufangyaojiaqiangnaguanzhihouxujingjinguanlizuofa'gexianshiweishengjuzhenduibabituojibenerdanpingleiyaopinzhishidijichaqingxingdengyiti.weishengfulibuweijiaqiangguanlibabituojibenerdanpingleizhifufangyaopin,yiyunianyuerizhaokaiguanzhiyaopinshenyiweiyuanhuidicihuiyi,huizhongjingweiyuanchongfentaolunbingcanzhaoshijiexianjinguojiaguanlixiankuang,jueyijiangshangshuyaopinnaweidisijiguanzhiyaopinguanli.houxujiangyifazhichengxubanliyugaojibaoqingbenyuanhedinggonggaodengxiangguanshiyi.weilaigonggaohoushiyongbabituojibenerdanpingleifufangyaopinzhijigouyezhe,xuyiguidingshenqingguanzhiyaopindengjizheng,bingyuyewuchusuoshezhibuce,xiangshidengzaiguanzhiyaopinmeirishouzhijiecunqingxing,bingdingqishenbao;jigouyezheruyushiyongqianshupinxiangjinxingyiyaojiaoyuyanjiushiyanzhe,xushiqianxiangweishengfulibutichushiyongguanzhiyaopinshenqing,jinghezhunhoushideshiyong;gaidengyaopinzhishuru'shuchu'zhizao'fanmai'goumaijishiyongdengxiangguanshiyi,bixuqueshizunzhao《guanzhiyaopinguanlitiaoli》xiangguanguidingbanli.weishengfulibuyijiangquanlixiezhuxiangguanjigouyezhejinxingshenqingchengxu,bingfudaopeihexiangguanguanliliucheng.lingweiqianghuaguanzhiyaopinguanli,weishengfulibushipinyaowuguanlishujidifangweishengjumeiniandouchixujinxingyezhejijigouzhiguanzhiyaopinshidijihe,yiquebaoguanzhiyaopinheguishiyong.niangexianshiweishengjuguanzhiyaopinshidijiheqingxing,muqiantongji(nianyuerinianyueri)guanzhiyaopinshidijihejigoujiyezhegongjiaci,chahuojiaciweigui,qizhongjiaciweixingzhengshushi(liru:buceweiluoshimeitianjiecunyujizaidiaojihuojinhuoshiloudengji'dengjigoumailaiyuancuowu'weiyiguidingdingqishenbeoshouzhijiecunqingxingdeng),lingyoujiaciweibabituoleiyaopinzhiyiliaobudangshiyongtngbaoan,yiyoudifangweishengjuyifajinxingcaichu.
